idea-plugin.name: Clear Cache
idea-plugin.description:
The plugin adds a "Clear Cache" button to the main toolbar.
One or more cache directories are configurable in the project settings.
When clicking the button, all files inside the cache directories will be deleted recursively.
The plugin settings allow to delete also cached directories and hidden files and directories.

Please note: This plugin is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.

The icons used in this plugin are part of the Fugue iconset (http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com/)
